doc.field: HRL with Clare Boothe Luce (2 folders)
HRL with Clare Boothe Luce (2 folders)

All of the photos have HRL and CBL by themselves or with other individuals. Includes HRL and CBL at the premier of "A Midsummer Night's Dream"; in Honolulu wearing leis; outside of a plane; in a cornfield at Mepkin; arriving at NY from Rome; at Alhambra, Spain; at various events; with Winston Churchill; at the visit of Premier Scelba; welcoming the Chilean President, Gabriel Gonzalez Videla; attending the opening of the play "Winged Victory"; on the beach; standing next to a voting booth; in Hong Kong; walking out of a plane to attend the Milan Fair; walking; standing or sitting as a couple; with Representative William J. Fulbright; CBL wearing a flight suit?; with Francis Cardinal Spellman; hunting; on a ship; picnicking in Spain; next to Wendell Willkie at a United China Relief rally; and at the Valley Forge Military Academy.
Series IX. Photographs >> HRL with Clare Boothe Luce (2 folders)
